title: the intercedency (authorpage)
content:
[[module Rate]]

(ˌɪntəˈsiːdənt )
**adjective**
//obsolete//
intervening, or coming between or among

Welcome!

I am [[*user Intercedent]], alleged economist, former four-letter-federal-freak and current corporate ghoul. If you're here and your name //isn't// [[*user Radian628]],  [[*user Anorrack]], [[*user Oblation]], [[*user Gelbsucht_IE]], or  [[*user xexnoncores]], god save your soul. If it is, welcome in! I've been expecting you :D

-------

+ Microfiction 

-------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-missile-knows-where-it-is the missile knows where it is]** (+181)

//He has been alive for 22.56 seconds and this he knows.//

This was my debut on the site and the obligatory one-hit-wonder that got me hooked on the path of ash and shame (tale author). I wrote it blackout drunk in 45 minutes while on the toilet, got great crit from [[*user A Random Day]] and [[*user PsychicProgrammer]] and woke up to 40 upvotes, seventeen missed phone calls, and one new hobby. My soul has known no peace since.

-------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/it-is-sweet-and-fitting-to-die-for-one-s-country it is sweet and fitting to die for one's country]** (+25)

//The last veteran of the Coldest War passed into history with the lowering of a sturdy oak coffin one winter morning, and few mourned at the loss.//

In memory of my grandfather. May he rest in peace.

-------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/the-gray-tide the gray tide]**  (+28)

//The name of the ship was Necessity.//

AE for [[*user LightlessLantern]], written for the prompt of 'prison ship.' End of Death remains one of my favorite canons, and the tale [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/there-s-a-hole-in-the-bottom-of-the-wishing-well There's a Hole in the Bottom of the Wishing Well] remains one of the best works I've read on the wiki so far. I took a great deal of inspiration from [[*user Tufto]]'s piece, hopefully I did it, and the canon, justice.

-------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/manifest-destiny MANIFEST DESTINY]**  (+35)

//Pray hard, American. Pray hard to die.//

-------

+ Macrofiction

-------

++ [[[RED QUEEN'S RACE]]]
-------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/strikefall STRIKEFALL]** (+48)

//Strike Team Ivory Dagger tears into existence amidst a gentle misting of frozen elephant blood half a kilometer above the acropolis. There is a statistically significant amount of turbulence.//

Borne out of the tripartite desires to make the Chaos Insurgency actually cool, to dissect the realistic shortcomings of teleporting power-armored shock trooper tactics (and also to write something longer than five paragraphs at a time), forged from smoke and flame and fourteen Speed Demon rereads, i brought unto the Wiki that greatest of banes.

Long form fiction. 

Fortunately, everyone who actually read the damned thing seemed to like it. 

-------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/FALLOUT FALLOUT]** (+50)

//“Mister President, fifteen minutes ago, the Foundation detonated a nuclear device on American soil.”//

The second step in RED QUEEN'S RACE. An attempt to portray a realistic grand strategy style checkmate set in a very unrealistic universe. Military logistics, CONPLANs, and action prose that [[*user A Random Day]] once called "adequate" abounds. OFFICIAL RECIPIENT OF THE MYTHICAL [[*user Pedantique]] UPVOTE.

-------

**[https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/greenlight GREENLIGHT]** (+38), co-authored with [[*user Anorrack]]

//Between them, two hundred and fifteen years of service, between them seven rifles, seven parachutes, seven shots of rum, between them one atomic bomb.//

A companion story/vignette set during the events of FALLOUT. Massive thanks to my coauthor Annorack, who I once saw bench press a 2003 Toyota Camry before biking fifty four miles in sub-zero conditions (normal morning commute). One of many building blocks on my path to eventually write something even more coked out than [https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/hypervelocity hypervelocity].
